ValidationRule.description: BODEV-2385 Clone of Salesforce Accounts Should Show Blank Netsuite internal ID
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Prospect"), NOT(ISNULL(Netsuite_Customer_ID__c )), NOT(ISNULL(Netsuite_Internal_ID__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please clear the Netsuite fields like (Netsuite Customer ID & and Internal ID) as the Account Type is Prospect
